fast3d.math.geom

Class Plate

  • java.lang.Object
    • fast3d.math.geom.Plate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GeometricObject

    public class Plate
extends java.lang.Object
implements GeometricObject
    representing a geometric (infinitely large) plate in 3d space
    a mathematical plate has no thickness or other properties other than it's base position and orientation
    Author:
    Tim Trense

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Plate(Vector3d base, Vector3d dir1, Vector3d dir2)
      constructs a new plate
      all given vectors must be finite and dir1 must not be parallel to dir2

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector3d calculatePuncture(Vector3d rayOrig, Vector3d rayDir)
      calculates the puncture point of the straight with this
      the straight must not be parallel to this
      boolean contains(Vector3d v) 
      Vector3d getBase() 
      Vector3d getNormal() 
      Vector3d getSpan1() 
      Vector3d getSpan2() 
      Vector3d nadirPoint(Vector3d point)
      calculates the nadir point of the given point to this plate
      the nadir point is that point on the plate that is shortest from the given point

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Plate

        public Plate(Vector3d base,
             Vector3d dir1,
             Vector3d dir2)
        constructs a new plate
        all given vectors must be finite and dir1 must not be parallel to dir2
        Parameters:
        base - any point on the plate
        dir1 - one of the two span-vectors giving the orientation, must not be zero
        dir2 - the other of the two span-vectors giving the orientation, must not be zero

    • Method Detail

      • getBase

        public Vector3d getBase()
        Returns:
        a reference to the starting point of the straight

      • getSpan1

        public Vector3d getSpan1()
        Returns:
        a reference to the first span vector

      • getSpan2

        public Vector3d getSpan2()
        Returns:
        a reference to the second span vector

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Vector3d v)
        Parameters:
        v - the point to test
        Returns:
        whether the point is within this triangle

      • nadirPoint

        public Vector3d nadirPoint(Vector3d point)
        calculates the nadir point of the given point to this plate
        the nadir point is that point on the plate that is shortest from the given point
        Parameters:
        point - the point to calculate the nadir point from
        Returns:
        the nadir point on this plate/triangle from the given point

      • calculatePuncture

        public Vector3d calculatePuncture(Vector3d rayOrig,
                                  Vector3d rayDir)
        calculates the puncture point of the straight with this
        the straight must not be parallel to this
        Parameters:
        rayOrig - the base of the straight
        rayDir - the direction of the straight
        Returns:
        the puncture point of this with the straights

      • getNormal

        public Vector3d getNormal()
        Returns:
        a clone vector that is orthogonal to the plate
